title: 299. "How Much Brain Damage Do I Have?"
description: John Urschel was the only player in the N.F.L. simultaneously getting a math Ph.D. at M.I.T. But after a new study came out linking football to brain damage, he abruptly retired. Here's the inside story — and a look at how we make decisions in the face of risk versus uncertainty.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
